Use: First byte tells to define int. Next 2 define the index in vars array. Next 2 define the value to save
First byte tells to define bool. Next 2 define the index in vars array. Last tells to be   false: 0   or true: 1
First byte tells to define string. Next 2 define the index in vars array. Next 2 tell the string length. The rest will be each character in hex.
